Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.turn

Class MovementManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.turn.TurnManager
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.turn.MovementManager
public class MovementManager
extends TurnManager
Concrete class for the Movement state of the FSM modelling the Turn flow.
Author:
AndreaAltomare

    • moveWorker

      private boolean moveWorker​(Move move, Worker worker) throws WinException, LoseException, RunOutMovesException, TurnSwitchedException
